4.7.1 Top-level items: 'a option, get and set

get

Function

Structure

Shell.Options

Type

val get: 'a option -> 'a

Syntax

get option -> value

Arguments

option
An option.

Values

value
The value of option.

Description

Gets the value of an option and returns it.
